overview:
Born and educated in Singapore, Teck Chung has extensive experience in software development and the Apple Macintosh platform.

Teck Chung has worked on a wide range of development and customization projects ranging from educational and corporate multimedia titles, corporate CRM & business solutions, Web applications, FileMaker solutions and iPhone applications.

He has been involved in implementing various end-to-end solutions from corporate business (hardware & software) technology infrastructure to deploying “live” Internet Streaming solutions and overseeing elaborate audio/video, lighting and multimedia production for events.

Teck Chung specializes in creating customized software solution for a project’s specific needs and requirements.
